name: Pesawat Syulid
description:
Pesawat Syulid

Flappy bird-like arcade game with a plane and apocalypse theme. Pesawat means plane and syulid mean hard, and the word syulid comes from a viral video from Indonesia, there would be a syulid sfx when you crash into a building. so basically this game is about a plane that is hard to control.

hop your way through buildings and reach as far as you can. hope you like it ^^

there's only android version that's available at the moment, I am planning to add windows and html5 version in the future. sorry for the inconvenience.

this game was made in a week btw
